85407.summary: Some customers in the Lower Mainland area are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
85407.title: Dec 15 - Lower Mainland | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

85423.summary: Some customers in the Brentwood Bay area of Victoria are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
85423.title: Dec 15 - Victoria (Brentwood Bay) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
